name: Blue squid
description:
Blue Squid
The tiny little blue squid is up for a big challenge, to save all his friends thats have been captured in bottles.
Drag and sling the squid away to smash the bottles and save all bugs and birds.

Blue Squid - The famous web game is now available on the Appstore FINALLY!
Download it for free and show everyone that you are the Blue Squid boss,
Compete with players from all over the world on the highscore list and earn your name up on the leaderboard.

Unlock awesome features within the game to make it easier for you to finish all level with 3 stars on all 45 challenging levels.

A fun game to play for any age, don't miss the Blue Squid!

Drag, aim and fire away the squid!
